title: Emily Ratajkowski models high waist trousers and a plunging black top while at the park with her dog
text:
She's not a regular mom, she's a dog mom.

And Emily Ratajkowski was in full canine-doting mode on Monday as she played fetch with her dog Colombo.

The 28-year-old stunned in a lowcut black shirt and high waist pants during the outing in NYC.

Doting dog mom: Emily Ratajkowski was in fill doting-dog-mom mode on Monday as she played fetch with her dog Columbo, in NYC

The model flaunted her busty chest, in the deep cut bodysuit that was adorned with two silver necklaces.

She paired it with high waist beige trousers and a deep brown leather belt.

Emily did add a sporty side to her outfit with white sneakers.

Outfit: The model flaunted her busty chest, in the deep cut bodysuit tat was adorned with two silver necklaces, and paired it with high waist trousers

The Inamorata fashion line founder wore her hair down in a sleek straight look and seemed to rock a fresh face.

Hot girl summer may be over, but Emily Ratajkowski is still pushing some sexy swimwear.

Her pup showed off his training skills as he fetched the ball and dropped it back to his mom.

Fetch: She adopted Colombo back in May with her husband of one year Sebastian Bear-McClard.

She adopted Columbo back in May with her husband of one year Sebastian Bear-McClard.

Recently, Emily has been taking to Instagram to tease some new pieces from her clothing line Inamorata.

The model posted a video to the brand's profile last Tuesday as she served body in a sexy one-piece.

Mom and dad: She posed with her husband and dog 'son'

Ratajkowski launched Inamorata in 2017 as a swimwear line, having since expanded to other womenswear pieces.

She's frequently modeled some of her own pieces for Instagram, as the brand seems tailor-made for her figure.

Ratajkowski started modeling at 14 when she signed with Ford Models, and she also pursued acting in films and music videos.

Her breakthrough came when she starred in the Robin Thicke's Blurred Lines video, which lead to Esquire naming her the Sexiest Woman of the Year in 2013.

Roles in major studio films such as Gone Girl, the Entourage movie and I Feel Pretty soon followed, while her modeling career continued to take off.
description: Emily Ratajkowski was in fill doting-dog-mom mode on Monday as she played fetch with her dog Columbo. The 28-year-old stunned in a lowcut black shirt and high waist pants during the outing in NYC.
